apps.title: Haste
apps.desc: A free and private pastebin alternative for sharing code snippets and text securely.

apps.title: HedgeDoc
apps.desc: An open-source collaborative markdown editor that respects privacy and allows to easily share docs.

apps.title: Nextcloud
apps.desc: An all-in-one solution for file sharing, calendar, contacts, and more, hosted on your own cloud server.

apps.title: Piped
apps.desc: A private YouTube player with no ads or tracking, perfect for watching content without compromising privacy.

apps.title: Send
apps.desc: Securely transfer large files between devices using sharing links with up to 2, 5GB capacity per file.

apps.title: Vaultwarden
apps.desc: The best password manager for securely storing and managing passwords.

apps.title: Lutim
apps.desc: An image hosting app similar to Imgur, but private and free.

apps.title: PrettyHeroes
apps.desc: A simple and colorful About Me page creator with no account creation needed.

apps.title: Mail
apps.desc: Access your emails securely from the webmail interface or with any preferred client.
